comment.author: 59842170@N00
comment._content: Looks like the inner square of Griffith Barracks, formerly Wellington Barracks on the South Circular Road, Dublin. I was in The Pearse, D Coy, 20th Inf Batt FCA in the 1980's and this looks very familiar. The angled corner in the left top of the photo would be in the direction of the old officers' mess.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/rockface] Thanks for that! Have tagged with Wellington & Griffith Barracks, and will do some more digging around...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 30369211@N00
comment._content: OS 25" link, the photo is taken from the centre of the square facing SSW. In this Bing Bird's Eye view of Griffith College, there are now a couple of prefabs on the spot in front of the blank gable wall behind these soldiers.
